text: JoAnn McClinton is an American politician. She served in the Georgia House of Representatives from 1993 through 2006. McClinton's oldest daughter, Lita McClinton was murdered in 1987.http://www.nbcnews.com/id/12009956/ns/dateline_nbc/t/flower-delivery- turned-murder/https://www.sun-sentinel.com/news/fl- xpm-1994-02-23-9402230539-story.html ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the Georgia House of Representatives Category:Georgia (U.S. state) Democrats Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: JoAnn McClinton
